nodes.text: Oshi-Jid was a Jedi Master serving the Jedi Order during the last years of the Galactic Republic. When the Clone Wars between the Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems broke out in 22 BBY, Oshi-Jid served with the Republic forces until presumably being killed in the Battle of Muunilinst.

A Force-sensitive being, Oshi-Jid attained the rank of Jedi Master in the Jedi Order. In 22 BBY, the Clone Wars broke out between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems and Oshi-Jid took the Duros Teo Gronn as his Padawan after Gronn's former master had been killed at the first battle of the war on the planet Geonosis.

Four months after the start of the war in 21.66 BBY, Oshi-Jid was part of the Republic forces sent to capture the planet Muunilinst, home of the InterGalactic Banking Clan. Oshi-Jid was presumed to be killed in action in combat over Muunilinst, leaving Gronn once again without a master.
Oshi-Jid was first mentioned in Only the Force, a stand-alone adventure written by J.D. Wiker and released by the RPGA on behalf of Wizards of the Coast in 2004.
